mapper.select: select count(goodsId) from tb_goods where sellerId = #{sellerId}
select distinct a.sellerId, b.shop_name from tb_goods as a left join user_info as b on a.sellerId = b.user_id where a.sellerId = #{sellerId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_goods (sellerId, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsOtp, goodsDeli, goodsContents, cateCode, goodsStatu, goodsImg) values (#{sellerId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsStock}, #{goodsOtp}, #{goodsDeli}, #{goodsContents}, #{cateCode}, #{goodsStatu}, #{goodsImg});
mapper.select: select goodsId, goodsName, cateCode, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDeli, goodsOtp, goodsImg, goodsContents, goodsStatu, regDate, sellerId from tb_goods where sellerId = #{sellerId} order by goodsId desc
mapper.update: update tb_goods set goodsName = #{goodsName}, goodsPrice = #{goodsPrice}, goodsStock = #{goodsStock}, goodsOtp = #{goodsOtp}, goodsDeli = #{goodsDeli}, goodsContents = #{goodsContents}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, goodsStatu = #{goodsStatu}, goodsImg = #{goodsImg} where goodsId = #{goodsId} and sellerId = #{sellerId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_goods WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId} AND sellerId = #{sellerId}
